forecast.name: Thanksgiving Day
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny. High near 58, with temperatures falling to around 55 in the afternoon. North northeast wind around 9 mph.

forecast.name: Tonight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly cloudy, with a low around 46. North northeast wind around 7 mph.

weather_report:
In Downtown San Francisco, the sun casts a warm glow on a clear autumn day, one that invites the city to breathe deeply. With temperatures keenly dancing around fifty-eight degrees, the warmth of the day is offset by a gentle north northeast breeze, promising comfort for all who venture outside. As the afternoon unfolds, a slight dip to fifty-five heralds the evening's approach, though the lingering sunlight will keep the chill at bay. Cloud cover this evening is minimal, allowing for glimpses of a tranquil sky that fades gracefully into twilight.

Dress thoughtfully for this delightful day; layers will serve you well, with light sweaters or jackets offering warmth for the cooler moments. The absence of fog creates an inviting atmosphere, perfect for a leisurely stroll along the Embarcadero, where the water reflects the azure sky, or perhaps a visit to one of the neighborhood cafés, where you can enjoy a warm drink while watching the city pulse with life. Whether it’s an afternoon of casual exploration or a cozy evening gathering with friends, today beckons you to savor its offerings in comfort and style.
